text: Rishton Ka Chakravyuh (English: Labyrinth of relationship) was an Indian television drama series that aired on Star Plus. The Show went Off Air on 23 January 2018 and it got replaced by a political show Har Shaakh Pe Ullu Baithaa Hai. ==Cast== === Main cast === * Narayani Shastri as Satrupa Vikram Singh, Baldev's wife & Anami and Vaatsalya's mother * Mahima Makwana as Anami Vikram Singh, ==References== Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2017 Indian television series debuts Category:2018 Indian television series endings
title: Rishton Ka Chakravyuh
